attr.title: Castlevania 2 Simon's Quest 'Revamped'
attr.desc: Gameplay in Castlevania II: Simon's Quest departs from the platforming genre of the first Castlevania, and introduces nonlinear gameplay and role-playing elements inspired by The Maze of Galious (1987), including a world map which the player is free to explore and revisit.
attr.inst:
https://metroidquest.angelfire.com/cv2revamped/index.html
  Download the .exe from above link and extract it(the exe itself) with 7zip or similar, then place data.win, audiogroup1.dat, & .ogg's into the /gamedata/ . If you have a 640x480 device rename the data.win file in data640.win.
